TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IMobileWebFormServices

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 定义页设计器组件的接口，以便在设计时获取设计器主机中的服务（如 Visual Studio 2005）。

span.span: Defines an interface for a page designer component to obtain services from a designer host such as Visual Studio 2005 at design time.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口中的所有方法都将由设计宿主实现并通过此 接口提供给设计器组件。All methods in this interface are to be implemented by the design host and made available to designer components through this interface. 尝试在自定义设计器组件中使用方法之前，请验证设计宿主是否确实实现了接口。Before attempting to use the methods in a custom designer component, verify that the design host actually implements the interface.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ClearUndoStack() cil managed
Public Sub ClearUndoStack ()
public: void ClearUndoStack();
abstract member ClearUndoStack : unit -> unit

summary.span: 在设计时清除设计器主机的“撤销”缓存中的所有项。

span.span: Clears all items in the designer host's **Undo** cache at design time.
This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于 方法是由设计器宿主实现的，因此在调用它之前验证它是否存在。Since the method is implemented by the designer host, verify that it exists before invoking it.

param.name: rootControl
param.span: 用于开始更新的容器控件。

summary.span: 在设计时以递归方式更新设计宿主中的相关控件及其各个子控件。

span.span: Recursively updates the associated control and each of its child controls in the design host at design time.
This API is obsolete.
